subject: JMS TestCase anyone ?
msgSnippet: Hi, I was wondering if someone had already written a JMSTestCase that would help in testing a JMS system, like a message-driven application ? The JMSTestCase
messageBody:
Hi,

I was wondering if someone had already written a JMSTestCase that would
help in testing a JMS system, like a message-driven application ?

The JMSTestCase would provide helper methods to send and receive JMS
messages. It could also override the runBare() method and automatically
execute a setUpJms() method before calling setUp() (and the same for
teardown()). Properties like name of queues/topics/JNDI info could be
externalized to a properties file and/or as Java system properties.

Anyone ?

Thanks
-Vincent
